description: A topical approach to Ch'ing and twentieth-century china at the intermediate level. No background necessary, although some chinese history is an advantage. Topics include millenarian movements, peasant rebellions, and the politicization of religlous movements in the modern period.
name: TOPICS IN DANCE HISTORY: 19TH C ROMANTIC BALLET

values.name: TOPICS IN DANCE HISTORY: 19TH C ROMANTIC BALLET
